scripts.android-demo:debug: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleDemoDebug && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/demo/debug/app-demo-debug.apk && cd .. || cd ..
scripts.android-demo:release: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleDemoRelease && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/demo/release/app-demo-release.apk && cd .. || cd ..
scripts.android-winter:debug: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleWinterDebug && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/winter/debug/app-winter-debug.apk && cd .. || cd ..
scripts.android-winter:release: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleWinterRelease && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/winter/release/app-winter-release.apk && cd .. || cd ..
scripts.android-regular:debug: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleRegularDebug && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/regular/debug/app-regular-debug.apk && cd .. || cd ..
scripts.android-regular:release: cd android  && ./gradlew  clean assembleRegularRelease && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/regular/release/app-regular-release.apk && cd .. || cd ..
